word: It would be well if Elder Cottrell and at least one other worker of broad experience should be called upon to consult together and consider your plans that affect the medical work.  God designs that his servants shall carry the responsibilities of that conference in a spirit of humility and dependence upon Him.--Letter 290, 1907, pp. 2, 3 (Aug. 29, 1907 to George W. Reaser).
